templates.name: Medieval Portraits
templates.template: Line art, vector art. Portrait, realistic. White background. Medieval. ${role} ${physical_traits}. ${clothing}. ${face_expression_or_emotion}
templates.author: drabiej@google.com

templates.name: 3D Clay Stickers
templates.template: A miniature clay animation 3D floating ${object_with_attributes} on a white background. The background is white. The colors are bright and saturated, and the overall look is playful. Everything in the scene is made of colorful clay.
templates.author: nmatarese@google.com

templates.name: Enamel Pins
templates.template: An enamel pin with a gold border on a white background. It features a ${object_with_attributes}. Enamel pin on white background. It looks like a pin you might find on a jean jacket or backpack.
templates.author: nmatarese@google.com

templates.name: Paper Craft
templates.template: A construction paper craft depicting a ${object_with_attributes} on a white background. Made of pieces of textured construction paper pieces. It looks like something you would expect from an art student.
templates.author: schome@google.com

templates.name: Stylized Portraits
templates.template: Close-up portrait. Graphic novel style. Vector art. ${subject}. ${profession_or_role}. ${physical_traits}. ${clothing_or_apparel_details}. ${activity_or_action}. ${setting_details}. ${background_elements}.
templates.author: drabiej@google.com

templates.name: Cake Pops
templates.template: A cute cake pop of a [object with attributes]. The cake pop is mostly round in shape and made of bright colors and mostly fondant and edible materials, with simple features and not too much detail. A lollipop stick protrudes out the bottom of the cake pop. The image is on a white background.
templates.author: jeganc@google.com

templates.name: Corporate Memphis
templates.template: A simple vector illustration on a white background with light blue background atmosphere and colorful characters. It features [subject in location]. A google-style vector illustration. The type of illustration you would see on a modern website.
templates.author: hatefulcrawdad@google.com

templates.name: Embroidered Patches
templates.template: An embroidered patch like you might see on a backpack or jean jacket. The patch has a [color profile] picture of [an object] and [optional phrase]. The patch's shape is a [shape]. The edges are a solid color of string piped all around. The patch is on a white background, shot from overhead.
templates.author: btomassetti@google.com

templates.name: Stylized 3D
templates.template: A miniature soap animation 3D floating [object with attributes] on a white background. The background is white. The colors are bright and saturated, and the overall look is playful. Everything in the scene is made of colorful translucent soap.
templates.author: aastewart@google.com & nmatarese@google.com

templates.name: Black Ink Tattoo
templates.template: A monochrome black ink tattoo of [object with attributes] on a person’s arms. The image is zoomed in on the tattoo. The person is [gender] and muscular. The person’s face is not in the frame.
templates.author: hamidmohammadi@google.com
